# Modify an App Screenshot

**Web Service Endpoint**

Commit an app screenshot after uploading it.

## Creating, Modifying, and Deleting Screenshots

- **Create an App Screenshot**: Add a new screenshot to a screenshot set.
- **Delete an App Screenshot**: Delete an app screenshot that is associated with a screenshot set.

items.description: Add a new screenshot to a screenshot set.

items.description: Delete an app screenshot that is associated with a screenshot set.
